ResearchProjectDef.label: Traditions
ResearchProjectDef.description: Our feudal heritage cannot be forgotten - we should honour it. Unlocks the throne, banquet table and chair, and brazier. Unlocks the electric lamp-post with electricity.\n\nRequires Leeani researcher.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Arkhaevists
ResearchProjectDef.description: Without books and knowledge, where would we be now? Unlocks the bookshelf, which provides a boost to research speed when near a research table and can provide some joy to read its contents.\n\nRequires Leeani researcher.
